data.field: I stand up (fundamental vascular decompression) I walk away (mental decompression) I leave work (attitudinal decompression) I drive home (cylinder compressions) listening to music (audio decompression) watching TV (visual impressions) waking up (diurnal recompression) driving to work (schedule recompression) in meetings (sudden pressures) when I'm taking a shower (fluid compression) [http://entertainment.howstuffworks.com/hitchhikers-history1.htm|lying drunk in a field] (inhibition compression) I'm doing something else
